TopicTitle: Textures twinkling - kerbal eyes, flag, flowers etc.

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I have an issue, that textures are twinkling as on the picture in link below. I have some visual mods installed (most popular ones), but certainly it is not Parallax, because I installed it after that issue.

Please help to solve this problem or tell me what graphic setting or mod may cause that.

Visual Mods: EVE-Redux, Parallax, Community Terrain Texture Pack, Texture Replacer, Textures Unlimited, Firespitter, TUFX, PlanetShine, EVA Enhancements

https://imgur.com/a/Om53TdO

 

EDIT:

I' ve solved that problem! 

The reason was Mod "TUFX" and setting "HDR" turned ON. I disabled it and it works properly - in the link above are images to show that option.

 

 

Edited June 15, 2023 by Sonasan
Problem solved
